name: Tomb Lord
aura: Increase Ally ACC in Doom Tower battles by 70

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on the target for 2 turns if this attack is critical.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 70% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 2 turns. If the hit is critical, has a 70% chance of placing four 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Death Burst
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Decreases the Turn Meter of all enemies with less than 50% HP by 100%. Has an 80% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also has an 80% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Gets an Extra Turn if an enemy's Turn Meter is decreased by this Skill.
